description.p: Defines the number of columns to display in the Grid before alternating to the even column color.

discussion.p: When *[ui:Alternate Column Shading]* is enabled, the *[ui:Odd column band size]* property is shown. This property defines the number of column to display using the odd column color before alternating to the even column color. The odd column color is the alternate background color for columns in a Grid.
See [Alternate Column Shading] for more information about customizing the column colors.
